reviewText:
First of all, two videos arrived, both in the wrong format, so I could not see them.  I only bought one, so I thought.
One was from Hong Kong and another from New NY.  What a waste of time and effort.  I sent one back to the outfit in N.Y. With a note and awaiting a reply.
Amazing movie. Came from China and is wonderful story. A most see. Subtitles in English only even thou this is blue ray.
